projects.title: AltPals - Social Matching Platform
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Real-Time Match & Chat Application
projects.shortDescription: Tinder-like dating web application with real-time messaging, AI-powered bot conversations, and smart matching algorithms.
highlights: Real-time WebSocket messaging with Redis pub/sub
AI-powered bot conversations using Google Gemini
Async-first architecture handling thousands of concurrent users
Smart distance-based filtering using Haversine formula
Complete authentication system with JWT and bcrypt
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time messaging across multiple server workers required Redis pub/sub architecture. Balancing AI API costs with quality led to smart provider rotation system.
projects.outcome: Production-ready dating platform with sub-second response times and 50%+ cost savings through intelligent LLM provider rotation.
keyFeatures: 100 AI-powered bot profiles with unique personalities
Second Look feature to review rejected profiles

projects.title: OurAgents - Email Automation System
